targets.expr:
label_replace(
  label_replace(
    topk(5,sum(rate(netobserv_node_egress_bytes_total[1m])) by (SrcK8S_HostName, DstK8S_HostName)),
    "SrcK8S_HostName", "(external)", "SrcK8S_HostName", "()"
  ),
  "DstK8S_HostName", "(external)", "DstK8S_HostName", "()"
)

rows.title: Top packet rates received per source and destination namespaces (1-min rates)

targets.expr:
label_replace(
  label_replace(
    topk(5, sum(
      rate(netobserv_workload_egress_bytes_total{SrcK8S_Namespace!~"|openshift.*",SrcK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node",DstK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node"}[1m])
      or rate(netobserv_workload_egress_bytes_total{SrcK8S_Namespace!~"|openshift.*",SrcK8S_OwnerType=~"|Node",DstK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node"}[1m])
      or rate(netobserv_workload_egress_bytes_total{SrcK8S_Namespace!~"|openshift.*",SrcK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node",DstK8S_OwnerType=~"|Node"}[1m])
    or rate(netobserv_workload_egress_bytes_total{SrcK8S_Namespace=~"openshift.*",DstK8S_Namespace!~"|openshift.*",SrcK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node",DstK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node"}[1m])
      or rate(netobserv_workload_egress_bytes_total{SrcK8S_Namespace=~"openshift.*",DstK8S_Namespace!~"|openshift.*",SrcK8S_OwnerType=~"|Node",DstK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node"}[1m])
      or rate(netobserv_workload_egress_bytes_total{SrcK8S_Namespace=~"openshift.*",DstK8S_Namespace!~"|openshift.*",SrcK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node",DstK8S_OwnerType=~"|Node"}[1m])
    ) by (SrcK8S_Namespace, SrcK8S_OwnerName, DstK8S_Namespace, DstK8S_OwnerName)),
    "SrcK8S_Namespace", "non pods", "SrcK8S_Namespace", "()"
  ),
  "DstK8S_Namespace", "non pods", "DstK8S_Namespace", "()"
)

label_replace(
  label_replace(
    topk(5, sum(
      rate(netobserv_workload_egress_bytes_total{SrcK8S_Namespace=~"openshift.*",SrcK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node",DstK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node"}[1m])
      or rate(netobserv_workload_egress_bytes_total{SrcK8S_Namespace=~"openshift.*",SrcK8S_OwnerType=~"|Node",DstK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node"}[1m])
      or rate(netobserv_workload_egress_bytes_total{SrcK8S_Namespace=~"openshift.*",SrcK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node",DstK8S_OwnerType=~"|Node"}[1m])
      or rate(netobserv_workload_egress_bytes_total{SrcK8S_Namespace!~"openshift.*",DstK8S_Namespace=~"openshift.*",SrcK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node",DstK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node"}[1m])
      or rate(netobserv_workload_egress_bytes_total{SrcK8S_Namespace!~"openshift.*",DstK8S_Namespace=~"openshift.*",SrcK8S_OwnerType=~"|Node",DstK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node"}[1m])
      or rate(netobserv_workload_egress_bytes_total{SrcK8S_Namespace!~"openshift.*",DstK8S_Namespace=~"openshift.*",SrcK8S_OwnerType!~"|Node",DstK8S_OwnerType=~"|Node"}[1m])
    ) by (SrcK8S_Namespace, SrcK8S_OwnerName, DstK8S_Namespace, DstK8S_OwnerName)),
    "SrcK8S_Namespace", "non pods", "SrcK8S_Namespace", "()"
  ),
  "DstK8S_Namespace", "non pods", "DstK8S_Namespace", "()"
)
